feature.title:
Insert your SIM card into your c6-01:
1. From the Main Menu, select Contacts
2. Choose Select > Select All
3. Then select Copy > Save to SIM Card
4. Eject the SIM card and insert it into your Xiaomi device
On your Xiaomi device:
1. Open Contacts
2. Go to Menu > Import/export contacts > Import from storage
3. Follow the onscreen instructions
